title: fioras ult
body:
fiora's ult got nerfed so now her ult does no damge at 6 if u dont have timat by than plz can u give her a early buff or somthing like that to increase the damge of her ult it is usless if u dont have {{item:3074}} so plz give her  buff just so her ult can do damge at 6
ty

replies.body:
[They are changing her ult soon TM anyway](http://www.surrenderat20.net/2014/04/red-post-collection-guinsoo-and-his.html).

http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/attachment.php?attachmentid=938879&d=1396668009
so her ult well be more like a steroid ??
By no damage do you mean how she can ignite + ult to kill anyone 100 to 0?
